content: This is no joke anymore. Trump and his team are playing the media at their own discretion. With his twitter flash bangs, Trump keeps the media busy. At the same time the administration is pulling the press through the arena by its nose ring while the important issues are being handled in the background and coverage of those issues neglected, drowned in noise. The press is acting exactly like Trump predicted and he is using this to his advantage. Luckily we have a dictionary, a teen magazine and a national park resisting.The last bulwark?
